name: drag-drop-stage-component
description: A component to "drag'n drop"-enable your projects, maintained and simple, light on dependencies

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:demo: npm run install:redux && npm run workaround-babel && tsc -p tsconfig.json && pug src/jade/index.jade -o pub && lessc src/less/demo.less pub/css/demo.css
scripts.workaround-babel: rm -rf `node_modules`/@types/babel__* ; echo 'Last command can fail if stage is a depenency'
scripts.install:redux: cp `node_modules`/redux/dist/redux.min.js pub/redux.js ; echo 'Last command can fail if stage is a depenency'
scripts.install:requirejs: cp `node_modules`/requirejs/require.js pub/js/ ; echo 'Last command can fail if stage is a depenency'
